overview: The Homecoming family is still counting their blessings in this 2nd soul-stirring musical feast.  Includes:  Count Your Blessings - The Martins  Greatly Blessed, Highly Favored  I Could Never Praise Him Enough - Greater Vision  We Are So Blessed - TaRanda Greene  All Over The World - The Booth Brothers  I Just Want To Thank You, Lord - Lynda Randle  Up To Zion - Ronnie Milsap  What A Difference You've Made In My Life - Ronnie Milsap  I Want To Thank You - Karen Peck & New River  Heart Of Mine - Dallas Holm  No Shortage - The Isaacs  I Love My Friends - Michael Sykes  Breathe Deep - Guy Penrod  Hard Times Come Again No More - Buddy Greene  Ellsworth - Jason Crabb  Please Forgive Me - Jason Crabb  Thanks To Calvary - Gene McDonald  He Is Here  Precious Memories - Bill & Gloria Gaither
title: Count Your Blessings
